location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 758/41 'The Handbook of the Persian Army, 1925.'

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence from the Chief of the General Staff to the Secretary of the India Office, Military Department, providing instructions regarding the safekeeping and subsequently the destruction of four copies of The Handbook of the Persian Army.

name.namePart: Chief of the General Staff, India
